医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究旨在确定有患偏头痛风险的青春期女孩​偏头痛不仅仅是严重的头痛。它是神经系统疾病中非常可怕的一部分，可能会出现一系列症状，包括颅骨搏动性疼痛、一阵阵恶心、呕吐以及对光和声音过敏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Studies-aim-to-identify-adolescent-girls-who-are-at-risk-of-developing-migraine-headaches.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Studies-aim-to-identify-adolescent-girls-who-are-at-risk-of-developmenting-migraine-headaches.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c14be22-09ed-4ecf-812f-1a2a1d402455 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 15:16:44 -0400 Studies aim to identify adolescent girls who are at risk of developing migraine headaches
虚拟现实培训以消除孕产妇保健中的隐性偏见在与产科医生进行检查时，玛丽莲·海耶斯告诉他，她感到极度疲惫，并可能出现产后抑郁症的症状，例如感觉不安全。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Virtual-reality-training-to-combat-implicit-bias-in-maternal-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Virtual-reality-training-to-combat-implicit-bias-in-maternal-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cb43764-efac-45cd-a897-137132252e7b Mon, 22 Jul 2024 15:10:00 -0400 Virtual reality training to combat implicit bias in maternal health care
用于道德和有效药物测试的合成解决方案通过药物治疗改善人类生活质量是一个复杂的问题。药品认证，包括药品安全性和可靠性，需要经过一系列的测试和政府批准，然后才能供任何人使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Synthetic-solutions-for-ethical-and- effective-drug-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Synthetic-solutions-for-ethical-and- effective-drug-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b89ee3c3-ca41-44a0-97cd-62e094765234 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 15:05:44 -0400 Synthetic solutions for ethical and effective drug testing
发现了后续中风和 MACE 的遗传和分子危险因素经历过动脉缺血性中风 (AIS) 或短暂性缺血性中风 (TIA) 的人遭受第二次中风或其他主要不良心血管事件 (MACE) 的风险增加，因此识别危险因素和治疗方法以预防这些事件至关重要后续发生的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Genetic-and-molecular-risk-factors-discovered-for-subsequent-中风-and-MACE.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Genetic-and-molecular-risk-factors-discovered-for-subsequent-中风-and-MACE.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b995094-a3d0-4b79-8f94-96729694133d Mon, 22 Jul 2024 14:50:00 -0400 Genetic and molecular risk factors discovered for subsequent stroke and MACE
研究揭示登革热令人惊讶的入侵策略曾经仅限于热带地区的蚊媒病毒感染正在蔓延。据世界卫生组织估计，登革热病毒每年在全球感染多达 4 亿人，并且目前尚无针对这种疾病的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Research-uncovers-denguee28099s-surprising-invasion-strategies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Research-uncovers-denguee28099s-surprising-invasion-strategies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c203aab-bd1f-470d-be13-f3aab5e6a6a9 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 14:35:56 -0400 Research uncovers dengue’s surprising invasion strategies
研究揭示 PAD 手术后截肢率与年龄相关的差异根据今天发表在《美国心脏》杂志上的一项新研究，患有严重外周动脉疾病或 PAD 的 50 多岁的人可能比 80 多岁的人在紧急手术后一到五年接受腿部截肢以恢复下肢的血流协会的旗舰期刊《流通》。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Study-reveals-age-lated-differences-in-amputation-rates-following-PAD-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Study-reveals-age-lated-differences-in-amputation-rates-following-PAD-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb76be8a-363​​a-45f3-a374-49d84c569f74 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 14:29:07 -0400 Study reveals age-related differences in amputation rates following PAD surgery
可折叠袋致动器使康复手套中的手指能够伸展柔软的康复手套已成为帮助手部功能相关残疾患者恢复手指运动的流行工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Foldable-Pouch-Actuator-Enables-Finger-Extension-in-Rehabilitation-Gloves.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Foldable-Pouch-Actuator-Enables-Finger-Extension-in-Rehabilitation-Gloves.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0bafb1a-1a94-4d01-9fbd-504bf121d19b Mon, 22 Jul 2024 14:23:00 -0400 Foldable Pouch Actuator Enables Finger Extension in Rehabilitation Gloves
研究表明蛋白质能够预测多种疾病的发生对从一滴血液中测量的数千种蛋白质进行的研究表明，蛋白质能够预测许多不同疾病的发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Research-shows-the-ability-of- Proteins-to-predict-onset-of-many-diverse-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Research-shows-the-ability-of- Proteins-to-predict-onset-of-many-diverse-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=727fc2cb-f3ae-44b6-a341-4ae8a5b70f92 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 14:14:05 -0400 Research shows the ability of proteins to predict onset of many diverse diseases
罕见病诊断的创新遗传学方法大多数罕见病都有遗传原因。潜在的基因改变越来越容易被发现，例如通过外显子组测序（ES），从而进行分子遗传学诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Innovative-genic-approaches-to-rare-disease-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Innovative-genic-approaches-to-rare-disease-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3cf441a8-7d29-49bb-9dc9-cd8bd535a373 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 13:57:00 -0400 Innovative genetic approaches to rare disease diagnosis
了解消费者同意的数据以优化数字健康计划在本次采访中，News Medical 与 LexisNexis® Risk Solutions 的医疗保健业务部门讨论了如何通过更好地了解消费者同意的数据来优化临床试验筛查和数字健康计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Understanding-Consumer-Consented-Data-to-Optimize-Digital-Health-Programs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Understanding-Consumer-Consented-Data-to-Optimize-Digital-Health-Programs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d064b617-2c62-4d58-80f3-4f12bf79e105 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 11:35:00 -0400 Understanding Consumer-Consented Data to Optimize Digital Health Programs
